## Sec256k1Provider.(constructor)

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Creates an instance of BjjProvider.

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(keyType: KmsKeyType, keyStore: AbstractPrivateKeyStore);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  keyType | [KmsKeyType](./js-sdk.kmskeytype.md) | kms key type |
|  keyStore | [AbstractPrivateKeyStore](./js-sdk.abstractprivatekeystore.md) | key store for kms |
